data.speaker: Friend
data.content: That's kind of weird... so the top one is going to kill the one on his left? Then number 11 will kill number 10?

data.speaker: Player
data.content: You've said all this already! I've seen all this already! What is happening? Why can't I remember?

data.speaker: Friend
data.content: You know how to solve this? *cough* Liv, I... I really don't feel well...

data.speaker: Player
data.content: Yes... I know the answer... But... Something seems wrong with my memory... If I've been here before...

data.speaker: Player
data.content: And you! I can't remember you! Why did I forget these things? How much have I forgotten?

data.speaker: Friend
data.content: Our priority is escape! *HRAK HRUAAAK* I think I might need medical attention...

data.speaker: Friend
data.content: So which is it? Where do you have to sit to ensure your survival?
